title: Master Sciences et Techniques - GÃ©nie Industriel
description: The Master in Sciences and Techniques - Industrial Engineering program aims to provide students with the necessary knowledge and skills to meet the evolving needs of the socio-economic environment. It covers technical equipment characteristics, technology importance in production development, business perception, and management tools for production stages.
access_conditions: Admission to this Master's program in Sciences and Techniques is based on a review of the applicant's file and entrance exam. Applicants should hold a Bachelor's degree in a related field or an equivalent recognized diploma meeting the admission criteria specified by the program's academic team.
